Dear Developers!

Thank you for best architecture of web application I can see, really excellent! :))

But one moment break my heart :((

This moment is very bad performance, for example: you use Unity, and often call Resolve method within one http-context, so many instantiations of services, repositories and data-contexts. Why?!

Regards, Alexey Ostapenko. Russia.

Not a problem is multiple instantiations of same data-contexts (many time to constract one instance)

or not a problem the bad performance?
